overview:
San Biegwenja, Born on 22 january 1990. San Biegwenja is a MIT student, San Biegwenja is also know as Arshalan Al Aham. San Biegwenja is Known by Creating a Genuine Network Trustship. Trustship was Founded in 4 july 2011 by San biegwenja and His Indian Friend Yogesh kushwaha. San biewgwenja was Awarded for Top #1 Ranking in MIT computer science competition. November 2010, Indian News Paper “Dainik bhashkar” written an Article about San biegwenja as Youngest Millionaire of The Europe! In the age of 18 he has done such a impossible tasks in this world.

Personal Life: San biegwenja is Son of Dr M.S Kaifie, he is a Doctor. San biegwenja has 1 sister and 1 brother. His Family lives in India.

Education: At S.G.M High He was failed 2 times in 8th class because his attention on Books was very low. one day san biegwenja created a Visual Learning Software with the help of His Uncle, his uncle is a software engineer. He was completed Syllabus of 8th in only 3 months. He was Topper in His School. He said ‘In 2 years of success i learnt how we can’t get success’. After being topper in 10th board. He joined Marsk man Institute of Technology. and He started Making Softwares, He created lots of usefull softwares, because of his talent, now he is a MIT student.

Financial Life : At an annual fungtion of M.I.T , there was lots of Business Men and Investors. San Biegwenja Announced that ‘I will software package in 1.3 million with a business Man, and I am going to sell this with 50+ more. Let me see who is going to invest here’. He Proposed every investors with 50% of share. He sold 2 million softwares and Programs in 80 days. his personal wealth was estimated to be 10.7 million in 1 year.

Awards: San Biegwenja was Awarded in 2008 for being topper in MIT computer Science Competition. San Biegwenja is also awarded for Making Coaching institute softwares by Megasoft Corporation.

Foundings: San biegwenja is sit on Computer 15 hours in a day. in 2003 he was founded Visual Education Learning Software. PHP-wbhp-SDK (PHP hypertext software development in wbhp language). in july 2011 he founded the big Genuine Network “Trustship”. he thinks that we joined so many socials but i think we still need one missed Thing and that is “Publicity and Trust” .

Trustship :

Trustship is a Genuine Network which is founded by San biegwenja and His indian friend ‘Yogesh kushwaha” Trustship help people to gain publicity and Trust from people whom you Trusted. You may Trust a person, he got +1 more publicity, The Cycle of Trustship is Like Confirming Trust Friendship or Relationship.
